about_the_game:
This DLC is for the original Sniper Elite V2 (2012). And is included in Sniper Elite V2 Remastered - launching 14th May 2019

A brand new mission. Three new weapons.

Three Nazi Generals meet under the cover of darkness. Now is your chance to take them out in one fell swoop. You are outnumbered, but you have one advantage... the enemy doesn't know you’re coming.

Strike fast. Strike clean. Make them pay.

• New Campaign Mission: Take out three German generals as they convene in night-time Berlin.

• New Tactics: Devise your own plan for success; use everything to your advantage in this test of nerves and skill.

• New Weapons: The MP44 “Storm Rifle” SMG, and two new sniper rifles: The Lee Enfield Mk. III and the Japanese Type 99.
detailed_description:
This DLC is for the original Sniper Elite V2 (2012). And is included in Sniper Elite V2 Remastered - launching 14th May 2019

A brand new mission. Three new weapons.

Three Nazi Generals meet under the cover of darkness. Now is your chance to take them out in one fell swoop. You are outnumbered, but you have one advantage... the enemy doesn't know you’re coming.

Strike fast. Strike clean. Make them pay.

• New Campaign Mission: Take out three German generals as they convene in night-time Berlin.

• New Tactics: Devise your own plan for success; use everything to your advantage in this test of nerves and skill.

• New Weapons: The MP44 “Storm Rifle” SMG, and two new sniper rifles: The Lee Enfield Mk. III and the Japanese Type 99.

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS *: Microsoft® Windows® Vista (Service Pack 2) or Windows® 7 or Windows® 8. Windows® XP is NOT supported.
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU with SSE3 (Intel® Pentium® D 3GHz / AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 4200) or better
  • Memory: 2GB system memory
  • Hard Disk Space: 10GB of free drive space
  • Video Card: Microsoft® DirectX® 10.0 compatible graphics card with 256 MB of memory (NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 series / ATI Radeon™ HD 3870) or better
  • Sound: Microsoft® DirectX® 10.0 compatible sound card or better
  • DirectX®: Microsoft® DirectX® 11.0
